sourcesContent:
<template>
  <MainLayout>
    <v-sheet class="mx-auto" width="300">
      <v-form @submit.prevent>
        <v-text-field
          v-model="firstName"
          type="password"
          :rules="rules"
          label=" Saisie de la phrase secrète"
        ></v-text-field>
        <v-btn class="mt-2" type="submit" block>Enregistrer</v-btn>
      </v-form>
    </v-sheet>
  </MainLayout>
</template>
<script>
import MainLayout from "./../layouts/MainLayout.vue";
export default {
  components: {
    MainLayout,
  },
  data: () => ({
    firstName: "",
    rules: [
      (value) => {
        if (value) return true;

        return "tu doit enter la phrase secrète";
      },
    ],
  }),
};
</script>
